thread.title: Lakers’ Jeanie Buss fired her brother, and now people are making ‘Game of Thrones’ jokes | For The Win
thread.title_full: Lakers’ Jeanie Buss fired her brother, and now people are making ‘Game of Thrones’ jokes | For The Win

author: Charles Curtis
title: Lakers’ Jeanie Buss fired her brother, and now people are making ‘Game of Thrones’ jokes | For The Win
text:
By: Charles Curtis | February 21, 2017 2:30 pm Follow @bycharlescurtis 
Some big news has come out of Los Angeles on Tuesday: Not only did the Lakers officially hire Magic Johnson (as they had said they’d do earlier this month ), but the franchise also let go of general manager Mitch Kupchak and Jim Buss was relieved of his duties as executive vice president of basketball operations. 
What’s particularly noteworthy about that fact is that Lakers president and part-owner Jeanie Buss is the one who did the removal of her brother from his position. It appears she has that power because she outranks him as president of the franchise even though they’re part of the ownership group. 
That has the Internet making a very specific comparison to a certain character from Game of Thrones (WARNING: SPOILERS POTENTIALLY AHEAD) : Jeanie Buss swear she Cersei Lannister.
